com.googlecode.cqengine.index.sqlite

Class SQLiteIdentityIndex<A extends Comparable<A>,O>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.googlecode.cqengine.index.sqlite.SQLiteIdentityIndex<A,O>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ModificationListener<O>, AttributeIndex<A,O>, Index<O>, IdentityAttributeIndex<A,O>, ResourceIndex

    public class SQLiteIdentityIndex<A extends Comparable<A>,O>
extends Object
implements IdentityAttributeIndex<A,O>, ResourceIndex
    An index which allows objects to be persisted directly in the index in serialized form, and to be accessed using a primary key attribute (as obtained from a foreign key held elsewhere).

    This index actually wraps an SQLiteIndex, but configures the value that it stores for each primary key, to be the actual serialized bytes of the object which has that key.

    Author:
    niall.gallagher

    • Method Detail

      • getForeignKeyAttribute

        public SimpleAttribute<A,O> getForeignKeyAttribute()
        Description copied from interface: IdentityAttributeIndex
        Returns an attribute which given a primary key of a stored object can read (deserialize) the corresponding object from the identity index. This is called a foreign key attribute, because typically those keys will be stored in other indexes, referring to the primary keys of this index.
        Specified by:
        getForeignKeyAttribute in interface IdentityAttributeIndex<A extends Comparable<A>,O>

      • retrieve

        public ResultSet<O> retrieve(Query<O> query,
                    QueryOptions queryOptions)
        Description copied from interface: Index
        Returns a ResultSet which when iterated will return objects from the index matching the query supplied.

        Usually ResultSets are lazy which means that they don't actually do any work, or encapsulate or materialize matching objects, but rather they encapsulate logic to fetch matching objects from the index on-the-fly as the application iterates through the ResultSet.

        Specified by:
        retrieve in interface Index<O>
        Parameters:
        query - An object which specifies some restriction on an attribute of an object
        queryOptions - Optional parameters for the query
        Returns:
        A set of objects with attributes matching the restriction imposed by the query
        See Also:
        Index.supportsQuery(com.googlecode.cqengine.query.Query)

      • onAttribute

        public static <A extends Comparable<A>,O> SQLiteIdentityIndex<A,O> onAttribute(SimpleAttribute<O,A> primaryKeyAttribute,

        Creates a new SQLiteIdentityIndex for the given primary key attribute and connection manager.
        Type Parameters:
        A - The type of the attribute.
